Html:
Hello,

I am not sure if there are different threads for this, but want to use vancouver style on MS word 2013.

I tried copying the styles into a bibliography directory but i am not sure if it is the correct directory.

So i am just wondering what is the directory for MS office 2013 and is the bibword going to work on microsoft office 2013? thank you very much!
I haven't had time to make a new release. But check http://bibword.codeplex.com/discussions/404418 on how to fix it yourself.
